Text:
Thanks for your effort but doesn't cut it on Mountain Lion

"Unable to Launch Total Spaces"

Dock Got an Error: Can't Continue 
. (-1708)

Please call home,,,,

Pity!

Sorry...It does but it does not play nice if you are running Default Folder X.

Depending on where you have installed it to Nowse to Library/ScriptingAdditions/ and remove default folder X

Looks like one or th'other...

So does the regular trial version work, or is it just the cracked app?
Maybe just an incompatibility all together with default folder x?

I got the same message both before and after applying the crack..

I then stripped out the  Default Folder X Addition.osax script and it launched and behaved fine without the messages. I have since put back the Default Folder.osax script and all seems well. I have not restarted the Machine though so I may run into the issue again on reboot in which case I may have to lose one or the pther app,,

Thanks again for the Up - this is a beaut of a Utility - Pre-Lion Spaces Functionality and Behaviour on ML...

i have no problems with this whatsoever 
running 10.8.3
i cracked it, but after a week or 2 it says that the trial period has expired, but i cracked it
it does work, its just that when i change screen, in the grid it says "trial period expired"
Didn't even notice that... doesn't matter, it works flawlessly and it's barely noticeable.
